title: Tandem electroreduction of nitrate to green ammonia on recycled copper sheets from spent batteries: splicing surface roughness achieves high yield rate
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3925-3932
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00700J, Paper
Abdelrahman M. Abdelmohsen, Ahmed M. Agour, Ibrahim M. Badawy, Ghada E. Khedr, Yasmine Mesbah, Nageh K. Allam
Electrochemical conversion of nitrate to ammonia (eNitRR) offers a sustainable alternative to ammonia production.
